item.title: my CV
item.description: Gabrielle de la Puente, Liverpool Writing, editing, curating, lecturing, chairing, consulting, teaching, mentoring, and just generally giving my opinion on stuff ‚úèÔ∏è Signed with Jo Unwin Literary Agency üéì Studied BA Fine Art at Central Saint Martins The White Pube est.2015 weekly reviews, essays & podcasts on art, games and other culture See Instagram, Twitter, recently resurrected Youtube Channel Podcast on Apple, Spotify + wherever you get your podcasts Successful Funding Application Library Selecting on the monthly Working Class Creatives Grant Juror for John Moores Painting Prize 2023 ‘Ideas For A New Art World’ published with Rough Trade Books Critics Club school for criticism with Three Rivers, Bexley Advice Columns Elephant and Dazed 2018 Global Initiative Speakers at Rhode Island School of Design Games Juror on 2023 BAFTA Game Awards - Multiplayer category Producer of Moon Games for Tour de Moon Game writing on The Haven of Aves for David Blandy’s Lost Eons series Teaching on Games Studies @ Leeds Beckett Other writing Report on The Impact of Using Social Media as an Artist for Unlimited Writing for Vittles Season 3 National Gallery commissioned a text of Eva Quantica Curation Founder of OUTPUT gallery 2018-2021 Assistant Producer at AIR for Tidal Twirlings, North Woolwich Founder and co-curator of Little Man Gallery 2015-2017 Teaching Tutorials & lectures at art schools internationally Mentoring artists (on DYCP)
